properties.headline: Flood Warning issued February 11 at 2:29AM CST until February 18 at 10:00AM CST by NWS Memphis TN
properties.description:
The Flood Warning continues for the Tennessee River.

The Flood Warning continues for
the Tennessee River at Johnsonville
* from Saturday, February 15 until Monday, February 17.
* At 1 AM Tuesday the stage was 359.7 feet.
* Minor flooding is forecast.
* Maximum forecast stage of 361.6 feet on Sunday, February 16.
* Flood stage is 361.5 feet.
* The river is forecast to remain steady through this evening then
begin to rise late tonight, cresting near 361.6 feet this weekend.
* At 361.5 feet...Low-lying portions of Old Johnsonville Road near
the Battle of Johnsonville Park begin to flood, and water
approaches some of the parking areas and campgrounds at Masons
Boat Dock near Waverly.
properties.instruction:
A followup Flood Statement will be issued Tuesday afternoon or
sooner if conditions warrant.

For graphical river and flood information...please go to
www.weather.gov and click near Memphis on the map, then select Rivers
and Lakes.

Do not drive through flooded areas...turn around don't drown.

Stay tuned to your weather radio and your local news media for the
latest river information.
